UniprotID	Q9UHM6-2
Accession	Q9UHM6;B7ZLB3;Q14D01;Q2PP22;Q8NGQ9
EntryName	OPN4_HUMAN
ProteinName	Melanopsin (Opsin-4)
GeneName	OPN4 MOP
Length	489
Function	Photoreceptor that binds cis-retinaldehydes (PubMed:15674244). Contributes to pupillar reflex, photoentrainment and other non-image forming responses to light (By similarity). May be involved in the optokinetic visual tracking response (By similarity). May be involved in the regulation of retinal hyaloid vessel growth and regression (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Cell projection; Axon; Cell projection; Dendrite; Perikaryon
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure
